thread.title: Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 launched in India for Rs 28,990 and Rs 33,490 respectively
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 launched in India for Rs 28,990 and Rs 33,490 respectively

title: Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 launched in India for Rs 28,990 and Rs 33,490 respectively
text:
Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 launched in India for Rs 28,990... Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 launched in India for Rs 28,990 and Rs 33,490 respectively By March 6, 2017 “The Galaxy A5 and A7 2017 boast IP68 certification for dust and water resistance” 
After launching the smartphones overseas, Samsung has unveiled the 2017 editions of its Galaxy A series in India, comprising of the Galaxy A5 and the Galaxy A7 . The Galaxy A3 , which was showcased at MWC, hasn’t been announced yet. Both the A5 and A7 boast IP68 certification for dust and water resistance, which means they can survive in up to five feet of water for 30 minutes.The Samsung Galaxy A5 and A7 come with a pair of 16MP sensors on the back and the front respectively and are powered by an octa-core Exynos 7880 processor mated to 3GB of RAM. The Galaxy A5 opts for a 5.2-inch full HD sAMOLED panel where as the A7 comes with a slightly bigger 5.7-inch full HD display. For storage, both the smartphones ship with 32GB of onboard memory which can be further expanded up to 256GB via a microSD card. The A5 ships with a 3,000mAh battery which goes up to 3,600mAh with the Galaxy A7, and both come with fast charging support. Samsung has priced the Galaxy A5 at Rs 28,490, while the Galaxy A7 will set buyers back by Rs 33,490. They will go on sale starting March 15th. Facebook Comments
